content:
IWithAvailabilitySet.WithNewAvailabilitySet Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachine.Definition
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.dll

In this Article

Overloads

WithNewAvailabilitySet(ICreatable<IAvailabilitySet>)

Specifies definition of a not-yet-created availability set definition to associate the virtual machine with. Adding virtual machines running your application to an availability set ensures that during maintenance event at least one virtual machine will be available.
WithNewAvailabilitySet(String)

Specifies the name of a new availability set to associate the virtual machine with. Adding virtual machines running your application to an availability set ensures that during maintenance event at least one virtual machine will be available.

WithNewAvailabilitySet(ICreatable<IAvailabilitySet>)

Specifies definition of a not-yet-created availability set definition to associate the virtual machine with. Adding virtual machines running your application to an availability set ensures that during maintenance event at least one virtual machine will be available.

WithNewAvailabilitySet(String)

Specifies the name of a new availability set to associate the virtual machine with. Adding virtual machines running your application to an availability set ensures that during maintenance event at least one virtual machine will be available.

public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachine.Definition.IWithCreate WithNewAvailabilitySet (string name);
